plot: A low-level triad &"big brother&" has a hot-tempered &"little brother&" who can't keep out of trouble, and consequently is in constant need of being bailed out by his protector. The &"big brother&" is super cool, but lacks the ambition to rise in the ranks of the triad societies - and once he meets his cousin from Kowloon and falls in love with her, he even thinks about leaving &"the life&".   Written by  L.H. Wong
title: As Tears go By (El fluir de las lágrimas)
